name: Strange Field Football
overview: Strange Field Football is a 3D cartoon pixel style 5v5 football game with up to 4 local players. This is a game that allows light gamers to have the fun of football. There is no fouls, no out of bounds, the only rule is to score more goals within the specified time. Pro gamers can also find their fun. Players' Hit point, use of special skills, and differences in tactics, every small operation may affect the final result.
